misc: Famous for being an ambassador for the AimPoint method for putting.
biography: Timo, a celebrated figure in the world of golf, hails from Keimola Golf and stands out as a prominent ambassador for the AimPoint method, a technique that has influenced many in their approach to putting. Known for his meticulous preparation and unwavering focus, Timo brings a level of dedication to the sport that is admired by peers and spectators alike.

With a notable presence at the Hector Trophée, Timo has participated in 8 editions of the tournament. His track record includes an impressive 3 victories in the Hector Trophée. While the Victor Trophy has eluded him so far, Timo's consistent performance underscores his skill and commitment to the sport.
While Timo is not expected to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, one can never rule out any last-minute changes to the field.
